chapters.title: Chapter 41: A Fount of Power
chapters.info: Mair, p. 652—Plump, blue-eyed Arafellin Accepted in the White Tower. She was a novice when Egwene came to the Tower, and was jealous of her fast rise to the Accepted. She is fond of giving Egwene orders in their new relationship. She was attending Elaida when the Seanchan blew open the wall and captured Elaida. She was not discovered due to the fact that she was buried in the rubble, so she was able to confirm that Elaida was collared.
